reference.ref-fulltext: Lawrence Lessig describes " traceability regulation " as a requirement by the state for service providers to employ software that facilitates traceability by making access conditional on the users ' providing some minimal level of identifi cation. Lessig, Codes and Other Laws of Cyberspace.
